pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, February 22, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

York Region, Ontario

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a discussion with personal support workers. He will be joined by the Minister of Seniors, Kamal Khera.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage at the beginning of the meeting

11:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a short media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Longueuil, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Longueuil, Catherine Fournier.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with farmers and agricultural producers.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
